hotels.title: Maldives Award-Winning Five-Star Resort with 13 Gourmet Restaurants & Palatial Villas
hotels.description: Five-star opulence awaits at the award-winning Soneva Jani, boasting palatial villas among the largest in the Maldives. A scenic speedboat ride from Malé is all that separates you from the golden sands of Medhufaru in the Maldives’ Noonu Atoll. Delivering luxurious lagoon living, this seaside sanctuary offers 51 overwater and three island residences that seamlessly fuse indoor extravagance with unforgettable vistas. Embark on an exceptional gourmet journey with 13 fine dining options on offer, from refined sashimi and silent cinema at Director's Cut to stargazing over sumptuous cuisine at Starstruck observatory. Savour champagne and canapes, snorkel the peaceful atoll with a marine biologist guide or unwind with indulgent rituals while soothed by ocean waves at Soneva Soul.
